name: RUF RT12 R AWD
description:
RUF proudly presented the Rt 12 R at the 2011 Geneva International Motorshow. The 3.8 litre bi-turbo boxer engine delivers 537 kW (730 bhp) of power with a maximum torque figure of 940 Nm.

A six speed gearbox deals with the power transmission and the 4WD system ensures optimal traction under all driving conditions.

The lightweight R using design details originating from motor racing is an optimal choice of vehicle for the race track. The suspension is also adjustable.
